name: Oskar's Psychedelic Serpent
description:
Oskar's Psychedelic Serpent is a premium cat toy designed, tested, and manufactured by hand in Seattle, WA.  It's sure to be the ultimate kicker-style toy for your cat.  Please note that you will receive one snake per order, although multiple snakes appear in some pictures.

-Approximately 20" long when in semi-coiled position.
-2 feet in length when stretched out.
-Springy semi-coiled body looks and moves in a life-like manner.
-Exterior is made from vibrant and durable organic cotton fabric.
-Two-tone color design comes in two distinct styles.
-Tail features a very loud rattle (perfect for blind cats)!
-Mid-body "scent gland" filled with potent organic catnip.
-Loud crinkle head for skull-crushing action.
-Felt tongue.
-Poly Fill.
-Awesome!

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

International Orders and Customs:

 We will ship internationally, however we cannot ship to Australia or New Zealand because of restrictions on the import of dried plant materials. Other countries may also restrict the import of catnip. Orders sent outside the United States will have a customs declaration stating the package contains products filled with dried catnip and it is the customer's responsibility to check local laws on the import of dried catnip. Any customs fees or import duty are also the responsibility of the customer.

name: Klaus Cosmos Stellar Red Rocket
description:
Ground control to Major Klaus.  Checking all systems:

-Catnip Level: Maximum
-Crinkle Noise Factor: 10 out of 10
-Teasing Tassels: Fully Engaged
-Cosmic Fun Potential: 100%

Prepare for blastoff: 3...2...1... 

The USA-made Klaus' Rocket toy measures 6 inches in length (10" with tassels) and 3 inches in width (4" including fins).  It is stuffed with potent organic catnip and makes an irresistible crinkly sound when squeezed.  Comes with Klaus Cosmos stickers!      

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

International Orders and Customs:

 We will ship internationally, however we cannot ship to Australia or New Zealand because of restrictions on the import of dried plant materials. Other countries may also restrict the import of catnip. Orders sent outside the United States will have a customs declaration stating the package contains products filled with dried catnip and it is the customer's responsibility to check local laws on the import of dried catnip. Any customs fees or import duty are also the responsibility of the customer.

name: CRAZY DEAL Chatouille Cat - Fancy Sleep Mat with Catnip Spray
description:
[CRAZY DEAL - normally $14 and $20]

“Chatouille” is the French word for tickle, and this sweet mat is sure to tickle your cat’s fancy, and yours as well.  Comes with a complimentary “From The Field” Catnip Spray Rejuvenator.  Shake and Spray on the mat to entice your cat to lounge on it.

Comes in two sizes: 13x13 inches or 17x19 inches (approximately 33x33 cm or 44x48 cm).  You can also choose between a velvety black color or a blue and white zigzag. 

Made with Silky Minky fabric, polyester fill and natural muslin. Machine wash cold.  Dry on low heat. 

Made in the USA!

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

name: Oskar & Klaus Holiday Greeting Card
description:
Here comes Santa Paws...
Here comes Santa Paws...
On a Vespaw down a snowy lane!

(This is not a poem that you will find in this card.)

Each Oskar & Klaus Holiday Greeting Card is printed on high-quality, thick 14pt glossy card stock, and features a folded design.

The card measures 4.25" wide by 6" tall, and comes with a white shipping envelope.  (approximately 11 by 15 centimeters)

The folded design has no text inside, but rather offers space to write your loved ones a personalized holiday message.

Designed and printed in the USA!

name: "Rescued Year to Remember" 4-Coin Picture Frame
description:
Remember the first year your heart was filled with joy, your home was filled with fun madness and companionship, the year you rescued your cat or dog!  Place a favorite photo of your pet in the Rescued Year To Remember Frame.  The black 9x7 inch desk frame celebrates the year you rescued your pet with genuine US coins minted from that year.  A Lincoln cent, Jefferson nickel, Roosevelt dime, and Washington quarter honor your pet's rescue.  

Famous presidential cats include India Bush, Socks Clinton, Piccolomini Hayes, Tom Kitten Kennedy, Puffins Wilson, and Tiger Coolidge. Presidents Washington, Jefferson, Lincoln, and Roosevelt all embraced dogs as part of their families.  A Certificate of Authenticity is included.

*Celebrate That Special Year!
*Desk Frame Measures 9 1/8" x 7 3/16" x 1/2"
*Includes 4 Genuine US Coins From Same Year.
*Assembled in the USA!
*Certificate of Authenticity.
*1 Year Manufacturer Warranty.

NOTE:  Send your pet's adoption year via message at checkout, or e-mail to info@oskarandklaus.com.  For personalized frames, please include your pet's name.

FRAME WILL BE SHIPPED DIRECTLY FROM MANUFACTURER, AMERICAN COIN TREASURES.  PLEASE ALLOW 7-14 DAYS FOR DELIVERY.  USA SHIPPING ONLY AT THIS TIME.

name: SALE! Fancy Cat Bow - Tannenbaum Green
description:
So you own thirty pairs of shoes and two closets stuffed with fine clothing you hardly wear, and kitty has just one frayed collar - it's time to change that! These super-fantastic fancy bows are designed by “The Klaus” and hand made by his human, Bethany, in Seattle, Washington. We think they’re an instant classic!

Bows measure 4.25 inches across and the tips flare out to 2.25 inches in height. They will fit neck sizes between 8 and 10 inches (average feline) and work for smaller dog breeds too. Additionally, you can remove the bow from the neck band and attach to collars measuring up to 3/4 of an inch wide.

Bows are secured around the neck with a Velcro fastener, however they are not recommended for outdoor pets due to the risk of snagging. For safety, you should always supervise pets wearing the bows.

Each bow is shipped to you in a recycled cardboard presentation box. As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

We welcome all photos of pets wearing the bows on Oskar’s Facebook wall!

name: SALE! Fancy Cat Tie - The Cat and the Dreidel
description:
A person should never go overboard dressing up a cat, but a tastefully executed fancy tie is another story. If your cat wears a collar, he or she can wear one of these super-fantastic fashion accessories. They are designed by “The Klaus” and hand made by his human, Bethany, in Seattle, Washington. These are real ties, not a just tie-shaped pieces of fabric sewn onto fake collars (hey, The Klaus has class). They feature a cat-proof secure knot that can be loosened and adjusted for length.

Ties measure 5 inches in length from the top of the knot to the bottom tip (this can be extended by up to 2 inches). The ties are approximately 2.5 inches across at the widest point. They will fit neck sizes between 8 and 12 inches (average feline), and they work for smaller dog breeds as well.

Ties are secured around the neck with a Velcro fastener, however they are not recommended for outdoor pets due to the risk of snagging. For safety, you should always supervise pets wearing the tie.

Each tie is shipped to you in a recycled cardboard presentation box. As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

We welcome all photos of pets wearing the ties on Oskar’s Facebook wall!

name: Sweet Pickles' Design Cat Collar - The Woodsman
description:
The Woodsman Cat Collar features beautiful French plaid fabric. Covered in dirt from a hard day's work or dolled up and ready to party, your kitty will turn heads while rockin' this unique and versatile collar.

All collars feature breakaway buckles for your cat's safety. Not to be used with a leash. Collar will ship with removable bell.
 
Standard size fits necks 7 to 10 inches in circumference, and works perfectly for the majority of cats. Please e-mail info@oskarandklaus.com to inquire about ordering kitten (5-8") and lion sizes (9-12").

All of the collars are hand crafted with love in Portland, Oregon. All collars are made of high quality webbing for durability and covered with hand selected ribbon. They use high end D-rings and durable hardware that secures easily into place.  Additionally, they feature double stitch stress points, making the collars both sturdy and gorgeous.

Please note that each collar is custom made and fabric pattern may vary.

name: "Rebel" 24oz Water Bottle
description:
Whether you own a bike, a scooter with a side car, or just like to stay hydrated, you need a good water bottle.  We just happen to have it for sale!

The bottle holds 24oz of your favorite beverage, is BPA-Free, and manufactured in the USA.  White color with black logo and smoke-colored translucent top.

Like all product we sell, a portion of the sale price will be used to help animals in need.

name: SALE! "Baby Oskar" Greeting Card
description:
[ON SALE - normally $2.50]

Here is the perfect card for just about any occasion!  Printed on high-quality 14 point glossy card stock, each card measures 4.25 x 6 inches when folded.  The front side features a photograph of Oskar when he was 8 weeks old (already smiling).  The inside is blank -- you provide the wisdom!  Each card comes with an envelope too.

These make perfect invitations, reminders, thank-you cards, get-well cards, or use them for birthdays, graduations, or to welcome a new baby into the world.  Why not give one to a friend who just adopted a new pet?  These cards also pair nicely with our fridge magnets. 

You'll also be happy to know a portion of the sale price of this card will be donated to animal rescue charities.

name: SALE! "Rebels" Greeting Card
description:
[On SALE - normally $1.75]

Here is the perfect card for any occasion!  Printed on high-quality 14 point glossy card stock, each card measures 4.25 x 6 inches.  The card does not open or fold like our other cards -- it's like a postcard really, but comes with an envelope.  The front side features the rebels riding their amazing Vespaw, heading to the next adventure.  The back side is blank -- you provide the wisdom!

These make perfect invitations, reminders, thank-you cards, get-well cards, or use them for birthdays and graduations.  Much like these rebels, there are no rules!

If you need multiple cards, check out the 6-pack option.  These cards also pair nicely with our fridge magnets.

Are you still reading?  If so, you'll be happy to know that a portion of the sale price of this card will be donated to animal rescue charities.

name: SALE! "Love is Blind" Greeting Card
description:
[ON SALE - normally $3.50]

So you want to send that special someone in your life a greeting card, but you don't want to come across as a person who picked one up last-minute in the local supermarket?  This is your answer (thanks to The Klaus)!  These babies are available ONLY on our site.

Each quality card features a gloss finish and measures 5 x 7 inches when folded.  The text (or rather poetry) on the inside reads "LOVE IS BLIND."  Each one also includes an envelope and one Oskar & Klaus sticker!  Top that Hallmark....if you can.

Buy a few and save on shipping.  There's always a reason to give another one!  Toss in an Oskar magnet and you're golden.

As with all items on our site, a portion of the purchase price will help animal charities!

name: "Oskar in Seattle" Fridge Magnet
description:
What’s square, measures 3.5 inches on each side, and has the ability to destroy the magnetic strip on your credit card (thus ruining your night)?  It’s the Oskar in Seattle Fridge Magnet, of course! 

While Oskar can't see what's outside the window, you can bet your last dollar that he knows exactly what's happening in the Emerald City!

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

name: "Stay in Bed!" Fridge Magnet
description:
Here's a daily reminder for you that sometimes life is better when you don't get out of bed!  Each magnet measures 3 by 4 inches.

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

name: “Baby Oskar” Fridge Magnet
description:
What’s square, measures 3.5 inches on each side, and has the ability to destroy the magnetic strip on your credit card (thus ruining your night)?  It’s the Baby Oskar Fridge Magnet, of course! 

While Oskar grew into a healthy adult cat in almost no time, there is no denying that he was one handsome little fuzzball as a kitten!  Get one, or get many, and spread the joy! 

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

name: “Rebels” Fridge Magnet
description:
What’s square, measures 3.5 inches on each side, and has the ability to destroy the magnetic strip on your credit card (thus ruining your night)?  It’s the Oskar & Klaus Fridge Magnet, of course! 

Get one, or get many, and support these fuzzy rebels as they take their Vespaw up to an amazing 28mph!  The adventure begins...

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

name: "Rebels II" Fridge Magnet
description: What’s square, measures 3.5 inches on each side, and has the ability to destroy the magnetic strip on your credit card (thus ruining your night)?  It’s the Rebels II Fridge Magnet, of course!

name: "Riding With The Rebels" Bumper Sticker
description: Durable, weather-resistant vinyl bumper sticker measures 11" by 3" (about 28 by 8 centimeters).  Put it on your ride to show your support for Oskar & Klaus!  While it will bring down the value of your car by about $300, the quality of your life will go up exponentially.

name: "Klaus' Rocket" Glossy Sticker 2-Pack
description:
Retro-futuristic sticky vinyl goodness, perfectly sized to block out your iPhone screen for good!  

Measures 4 by 3 inches (about 10 by 8 centimeters).  

You get two stickers per order - one for you, and one for your copilot.  Adventures are always best when they're shared.

name: "Rebels" Mini Stickers 20-Pack
description:
Three dollars gets you twenty delightful Rebels logo stickers.  Each square sticker measures 2 inches by 2 inches and has an orange background with black artwork.  These beauties are printed with a matte finish for a more refined, classy look which the Klaus prefers (glossy stickers are for brats, he once told us).  

Use these babies to refinish the front of your refrigerator, patch a hole in the drywall, or hide that annoying peephole in your front door.  They won't fix your broken iPhone screen, but they will cover up the faded Apple sticker on your Jetta.  You can do just about anything with these as long as you don’t stick them to your cat!  

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.  

BONUS:  Should you find a really creative use for these stickers, make sure you post a photo on Oskar’s Facebook wall.  If it’s REALLY good, we’ll send you twenty more for free.  Be safe kids!

name: "Good, Bad, and Cuddly" Stickers
description:
For a fistful of two dollars you get ten delightful “Good, Bad, and Cuddly” stickers featuring a very badass Klaus!  Each square sticker measures 3 inches by 3 inches.  These beauties are printed with a durable glossy vinyl finish to withstand the rugged elements of the desert high plains, or the abuse you dish out to your Trapper Keeper.

Use these babies to refinish the front of your refrigerator, patch a hole in the drywall, or hide that annoying peephole in your front door.  They won't fix your broken iPhone screen, but they will cover up the faded Apple sticker on your Jetta.  You can do just about anything with these as long as you don’t stick them to your cat!  

As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.  

BONUS:  Should you find a really creative use for these stickers, make sure you post a photo on Oskar’s Facebook wall.  If it’s REALLY good, we’ll send you ten more for free.  Be safe kids!

name: [SOLD OUT UNTI 12/30] "Rebels" Mouse Pad
description:
This is the final step in Klaus' plan to infiltrate office spaces across the globe:  the Rebels mouse pad.  Each one measures 7.5 inches by 8 inches, and is made from 3/16 inch foam rubber.  The front features a very crisp and detailed photo of the heroes in action; the back is made from a textured no-skid rubber.

Like all of our goodies, a portion of the sale price goes to help great animal rescue organizations!

name: Tria Maria - The Cat With No Eyes (A True Story) Children's Book
description:
A softcover children's book based upon a true story.  

While vacationing in the tiny village of Gennadi on the island of Rhodes in Greece, an American couple find a three-week old blind kitten following a horrendous storm on the anniversary of the 9/11 tragedy in New York.  After nursing her back
to the health, they care for her daily - much to the villagers surprise, and eventually decide to bring her back to the U.S.A.

Authored by Dr. Ralph ("Doc") Wallace, and illustrated by Isabella Girard. 

Publication Date:
Sep 18 2012

ISBN/EAN13:
1478205237 / 9781478205234

Page Count:
58

Binding Type:
US Trade Paper

Trim Size:
8.5" x 8.5"

Language:
English

Color:
Full Color

name: SALE! Fancy Cat Tie - Sunset Trip
description:
[ON SALE - normally $16]

A person should never go overboard dressing up a cat, but a tastefully executed fancy tie is another story. If your cat wears a collar, he or she can wear one of these super-fantastic fashion accessories. They are designed by “The Klaus” and hand made by his human, Bethany, in Seattle, Washington. These are real ties, not a just tie-shaped pieces of fabric sewn onto fake collars (hey, The Klaus has class). They feature a cat-proof secure knot that can be loosened and adjusted for length.

Ties measure 5 inches in length from the top of the knot to the bottom tip (this can be extended by up to 2 inches). The ties are approximately 2.5 inches across at the widest point. They will fit neck sizes between 8 and 12 inches (average feline), and they work for smaller dog breeds as well.

Ties are secured around the neck with a Velcro fastener, however they are not recommended for outdoor pets due to the risk of snagging. For safety, you should always supervise pets wearing the tie.

Each tie is shipped to you in a recycled cardboard presentation box. As with all products we sell, a portion of the sale price of this item will be donated to animal rescue organizations.

We welcome all photos of pets wearing the ties on Oskar’s Facebook wall!

Ties measure 5 inches in length from the top of the knot to the bottom tip (this can be extended by up to 2 inches). The ties are approximately 2.5 inches across at the widest point. They will fit neck sizes between 8 and 12 inches (average feline), and they work for smaller dog breeds as well.

Ties are secured around the neck with a Velcro fastener, however they are not recommended for outdoor pets due to the risk of snagging. For safety, you should always supervise pets wearing the tie.

name: Dried Katsuo Kanei Toku Shaved Bonito Flakes - 3.52 oz Bag
description:
In Japan, these dried tuna flakes are sometimes called bonito and katsuobushi.  Bonito refers to the slipjack tuna and katsuobushi is the name for the way these flakes are prepared.  Bonito flakes are used in many Asian recipes - but cats love them as well.  

-Human-grade quality food
-3.52 oz resealable bag
-One ingredient, no preservatives or additives
-Prepared in Japan (as is all bonito)

Bon appétit, felines!

name: Cat-Man-Doo Bonito Flakes 1/2 Ounce Tub
description:
This is Oskar's (very healthy) snack of choice!  Read all about it:

There is one product and only one product that goes into the making of Cat-Man-Doo Bonito flakes.  That product is called Katsuowonus pelamis, known to us here in the U.S. as Bonito.  Bonito is a bony fish that hails from the Tuna family.  It is fished wild approximately 300 miles off the East coast of Japan in the salt waters of the western Pacific Ocean, also known as the Sea of Japan.  The seawater is characterized by the elevated concentration of dissolved oxygen that results in high biological productivity.  Therefore, fishing is the dominant economic activity in the region.  Bonito is used extensively in Japanese cuisine for making a savory broth while cats and dogs love the flakes just the way they are, right out of the container!

Once caught, the fish is processed both by hand and by machine in a temperature controlled factory.  It is dried then cut into very thin slices. The drying process alone takes 20 to 30 days.  There are no additives or preservatives added to the fish at any point before, during or after the processing.  Absolutely nothing has been introduced into the fish to compromise its purity.  This is an important quality to be aware of when purchasing a healthy treat for your pet.  There are many different brands of bonito available on the market, however, there are a few things that make Cat-Man-Doo Bonito flakes popular with pet owners.

First, Cat-Man-Doo Bonito flakes are among the highest quality flakes on the market and they are derived from a single protein source making them a healthy choice when rewarding your pet.  Cat-Man-Doo flakes are larger, moister, and have a fresher aroma and appearance than other Bonito flakes.  Because Cat-Man-Doo Bonito is high in protein and low in calories with a minimal fat content, it is the perfect choice for our more “robust” pets.  It also contains Taurine which is an essential dietary requirement for feline health.  Taurine protects your cat from serious eye maladies.  The natural fish oils that are found in Bonito will keep your cat or dog’s fur shiny and beautiful.

Secondly, Cat-Man-Doo uses a patented MAP (Modified Atmosphere Packaging) process.  This technology extracts the oxygen from our containers and immediately seals them tightly, similar to the manner in which potato chips are packaged.  The MAP machine was developed and patented exclusively for Cat-Man-Doo Inc.  This “stay-fresh” packaging minimizes the drying, shrinkage, and breakdown of the flakes and allows the Bonito to stay as fresh as the day it was packaged.  With Bonito, freshness equals flavor and flavor equals quality and this is what drives cats and dogs wild for Cat-Man-Doo Bonito.  Thanks to this packaging process, nutritional value is maintained and the benefits are passed down to your pets by way of retention of the natural fish oils which provide urinary tract health, reduced hair balls, and a silky coat.

Just prior to packaging, Cat-Man-Doo Bonito flakes are sifted through a ¼” by ¼” stainless steel screen.  This removes a majority of the fines, dust, and small pieces that pets sometimes leave behind making it a better financial choice for customers since nothing goes to waste.  Finally, the flakes are packaged in a clear, reusable, recyclable container so that customers can see what they are buying.  Store your Bonito in a cool, dry place.  There is no need to refrigerate, but direct sunlight will shorten the shelf life of this product.

As with all product we sell, a portion of the purchase price will be donated to animal rescue charities.

name: Cat-Man-Doo Chicken Sprinkles (2 oz Shaker)
description:
2 ounce shaker of super high quality freeze dried chicken.

These real chicken bits are already crushed and ready to sprinkle over any food.  It's a highly effective food enhancement when added to a meal.

Prescription diets can be bland and unappetizing to a cat or dog who may have little appetite to begin with.  However, without these prescription diets, a pet with poor health may not live as long.

Veterinarians recommend adding sprinkles to a cat or dog’s diet in order to revive the appetite and spark an interest in eating.

*human grade, USDA approved white breast meat
*completely grain-free
*absolutely no chemical, additives or preservatives
*Because an average sized piece of chicken has fewer than 10 calories, you can be assured that they will not contribute to weight gain like other high calorie treats or biscuits.

This human grade, USDA approved white breast meat is carefully sliced into strips then freeze dried to perfection without the use of chemicals, additives or preservatives.

These savory treats are made of a single ingredient; no “mystery ingredients” to worry about!  100% Pure White Meat Chicken.  No refrigeration required!

These delicious chunks of chicken are easy to feed right out of the bag, and can be used as treats or food toppers for finicky eaters.

You can re-hydrate Life Essentials in warm water to soften them into a soft delicious treat.

There are no preservatives, additives, wheat, corn or soy added.
High quality, high protein chunks of chicken. 

Made in the USA!
